entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Ah, hello! You don't look Hollow, far from it!
I am Solaire of Astora, an adherent of the Lord of Sunlight.
Now that I am Undead, I have come to this great land the birthplace of Lord Gwyn, to seek my very own sun!
...Do you find that strange? Well, you should!
No need to hide your reaction. I get that look all the time!
Hah hah hah!
#0Talk-2nd time
Oh, ah-hah! So, I didn't scare you?
I have a proposition, if you have a moment.
#0Choose "No" to either the 1st or 2nd query
Well, yes, quite understandable.
Not to worry. Let there be no obligation.
#0Talk-After choosing "No" to either the 1st or 2nd query
Oh, hello. You're still keen on speaking to me?
Then, perhaps you have reconsidered my offer?
#0Choose "Yes" to the 1st or 3rd query
The way I see it, our fates appear to be intertwined.
In a land brimming with Hollows could that really be mere chance?
So, what do you say? Why not help one another on this lonely journey?
#0Choose "No" after choosing "Yes" to the 1st query
Not to worry. I do not wish to impose.
I was in the wrong. We'll laugh it off, shall we?
Hah hah hah!
#0Choose "Yes" to the 2nd query
This pleases me greatly! Well then, take this.
We are amidst strange beings, in a strange land.
The flow of time itself is convoluted; with heroes centuries old phasing in and out.
The very fabric wavers, and relations shift and obscure.
There's no telling how much longer your world and mine will remain in contact.
But, use this,
to summon one another as spirits, cross the gaps between the worlds,
and engage in jolly co-operation!
Of course, we are not the only ones engaged in this.
But I am a warrior of the sun! Spot my summon signature easily by its brilliant aura.
If you miss it, you must be blind!
Hah hah hah!
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to both 1st or 2nd query
Oh, hello there. I will stay behind, to gaze at the sun.
The sun is a wondrous body. Like a magnificent father!
If only I could be so grossly incandescent!
#0Talk-1st time
Oh, there you are.
You've been quiet these days.
Smooth summoning out there?
Anytime you see my brilliantly shining signature, do not hesitate to call upon me.
You've left me with quite an impression. I would relish a chance to assist you.
#0Talk-2nd time
You really are fond of chatting with me, aren't you?
If I didn't know better, I'd think you had feelings for me!
Oh, no, dear me. Pretend you didn't hear that!
Hah hah hah!
#0Talk-1st time
Hmm! Ah, oh...hello there.
Forgive me, I was just pondering... about my poor fortune.
I did not find my own sun, not in Anor Londo, nor in Twilight Blighttown.
Where else might my sun be? Lost Izalith, or the Tomb of the Gravelord...?
But I cannot give up. I became Undead to pursue this!
But when I peer at the Sun up above, it occurs to me...
What if I am seen as a laughing stock, as a blind fool without reason?
Well, I suppose they wouldn't be far off!
Hah hah hah!
#0Talk-1st time with 25 faith, or 5 less with each victory as White Phantom
Oh, hello there.
I'm glad to see you alive.
...You have done well, indeed you have.
You've a strong arm, strong faith, and most importantly, a strong heart.
I am in awe, really.
Yes, yes...
What do you think? Why not join me, as a warrior of the Sun?
Righteous knights, guardians of all that is good, in the name of the Lord of Sunlight!
...Only if it would please you, of course. Well?
#0Choose "No" to either the 1st or 2nd query
Yes, well, each has one's beliefs.
But if you change your mind, the offer is open.
#0Talk-After choosing "No" to either the 1st or 2nd query
Oh, hello there.
What is it? Have you changed your mind about my offer?
#0Choose "Yes" to the 1st query
Oh! Magnificent! I knew you would fancy it!
Then, join the Covenant! Here, stay still for a moment...
#0Choose "Yes" to the 2nd query
And there we are. Now, just say a prayer at the Altar of Sunlight, right there.
Then you shall know the brilliance of our Sun.
#0Talk-1st time after joining the Warriors of Sunlight Coverant
Oh, hello there.
Exhilarating, is it not? The power of the Sun!
I am blessed to have found such a brave companion!
Hah hah hah!
#0Talk-2nd time after joining the Warriors of Sunlight Coverant
Oh, hello there. Still here?
I could not hope for a braver companion than you!
Gah hah hah hah hah!
#0Talk
Was it all a lie? Have I done this all, for nothing?
Oh, my dear sun...What now, what should I do...?
...My sun, my dear, dear sun...
#0Talk-After killing the Red-Eye Sunlight Maggot before entering Lost Izalith
After all this searching, I still cannot find it...
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Hrg!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Ooh!
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time
Whoa!
#0Upon being attacked-4th time
What the...!
#0Upon being attacked-5th time
What's wrong with you?!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
If a stubborn beast you be, I have no choice!
A Warrior of the Sun will not just sit and take it!
Hrgraaah!
#0Upon dying
Why, you...
How could this...?
My...my sun...
#0After approaching him once he has been infected by the Sunlight Maggot
...Hrg, rg...Arrrgh...
...Finally, I have found it, I have!...
...My very own sun...I...am the sun!...
...I've done it...I have...
...Yes, I did it...I did!...
...Ohh, ohhh...
...Hrgrraaaooogh!...
#0Upon dying after infected by the Red-Eye Sunlight Maggot
...Ahh, it's over...
...My Sun...it's setting...
...It's dark, so dark...
##He has the key.
##The choice is yours.
##Ah, hello!
##I knew you would come! Just call it intuition.
##Both Undead, both imprisoned in the Asylum and now, we both end up here.
##I hardly think so!
##Now, I know not of your designs, but I sense something singular about you.
##Oh, yes! Wonderful!
##And there we are. Now you need only pray at the Altar of Sunlight in Anor Londo.
##Then you shall know our radiance, our duty.
##You have praying to do. At the Shrine of Sunlight in Anor Londo.
##But truly, I could not hope for a braver companion than you!
##I did not find my own sun, not even in Anor Londo.
